description: Try our easy to follow Persian Lemon & Elderflower Cooler recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Drink,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Dec 2019,Sesame free,Summer,Christmas,Wheat free,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Persian Lemon & Elderflower Cooler Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dip rim of 4 tall glasses in lemon juice, then 1 tbs sea salt flakes to coat.

Mix cordial, remaining lemon juice and rosewater essence together in a small jug. Fill glasses with ice and lemon slices. Pour over syrup and swizzle with a chopstick. Top with mineral water and serve immediately.
